item.description:
Join Triumph Triathlon at Walden Pond in Concord, MA for early morning open water swim practices. We'll meet in front of the lifeguard booth right next to the pond, ready to go at 8:00 am. We usually do an out & back 1 mile swim across the pond but you choose your own distance.

Make sure to bring a wetsuit, goggles, a swim cap, and a towel. Expect the water temp to be around 60 so I strongly recommend a wetsuit at the time.

Let's meet in the Walden Pond Parking lot following the Open Water Swim for a 9:15 AM departure. (Theoretically we always meet "near the bathrooms" but in practice it might be best to look for the large clump of cyclists involved in a messy T1). We will likely split into two groups, one medium (14-16 mph) and one faster (17-19 mph).

The cue sheets are available in the "Files" section of this Meetup. Since I'm out of commission for a while, it would be great if someone who rode with the group last year could organize the ride. I can send you last year's route(s).

Don't hesitate to email me with questions.

Look forward to seeing you all there!

Kim
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet in front of the lifeguard house
item.why: My favorite response "It was the cornerstone to my Tri 2010 training season"
item.name: Walden Swim and Ride
